channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
i need help...for 2 things
#1. how do i make myself an admin and see my gold crown on Testscape and Fr33sc4p3 Pkz
#2. can someone give me download for Fr33sc4p3 Pkz

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

Frell:

you cant be an admin in testscape.

umm yeah you can, in TestScape just open client.java and search for where it sets playerRights should look something like this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 2; }

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

you cant be an admin in testscape. in Fr33sc4p3 you can, go to your character folders and find your name…(you have to be logged out) and your name file will only apear if you have logged on that servr before, well anyway go to your character files and find your name and open it search for “player rights = 0” change the 0 to a 1 for a mod 2 for a admin 3 for the owner.

the download for free scape pk’s is somewere ill go get it… here it is
Fr33sc4p3 pkz

Read full topic
